name: Pushpa Kamal Dahal,  पुष्प कमल दाहाल
office2: Founder of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist)
party: Communist Party of Nepal (Fourth Convention),  (Before 1983) , Communist Party of Nepal (Masal)  (1983–1984) , Communist Party of Nepal (Mashal)  (1984–1991) , Communist Party of Nepal (Unity Centre)  (1991–1994) , Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist)  (1994–present)
